sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.0%.
Year to date, Nike registers a 17.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 3.2%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 10.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Travelers Companies ( TRV ), trading down 1.8%, and Merck ( MRK ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
